Question: In July 1960 the ____s left Cuba for the last time, leaving art and manuscripts in a bank vault in Havana.
Hints: This person said he "was out of business as a writer" from 1942 to 1945.
After his 1927 divorce from Hadley Richardson, this person married Pauline Pfeiffer.
During his first 20 months in Paris, this person filed 88 stories for the Toronto Star newspaper.
